title: Snapped into Submission
description: Bored with the meaningless sex he was having, Gareth was looking for something different whilst cruising in the supermarket. He certainly got that when hunky Ralph approached and offered him a job - to model for an erotic photo shoot. The man was a dream, Gareth was hooked on the spot, but the cute young lad wanted more than a modelling job from this god of a man. And boy does he get it when he goes to Ralph’s flat and the camera comes out. It was different indeed, and very much to Gareth’s liking, when over two raunchy sessions his true nature is revealed by this dominant man and Gareth is... Snapped into submission! This book contains explicit gay m/m content and is suitable for readers 18 and above.
author: Jack Brighton
